Name: 鞭炮&烟花：春节模拟器Firecrackers&fireworks：china new year simulation
About the game: Don't you have to set off fireworks and firecrackers this New Year? Let's play the fireworks and firecrackers simulator! 1, a variety of fireworks types and gameplay, super real fireworks and firecrackers game experience! 2. Experience the atmosphere of firecrackers and fireworks during the Chinese New Year. 3, you can be a troublemaker in the game, take firecrackers to interact with others or items! 4, all interfaces are in Chinese and English, you can learn authentic Chinese in the game! The game will continue to update, more scenes! More types of fireworks and firecrackers as well as play! Have a good time! Note: Please don't blast the grass! Don't blow up couples! Don't blow the manhole cover! Don't blow up the pond! Don't fry cow dung!
Publishers: 阿基米德 尼古拉斯 夏
